notifier.changelog:
Version 1.2

  • Added ability to homepage widgets to traditional blog style homepage.
  • Added posts navigation (optional, activate from Avenue theme options panel).
  • Added full height to social widgets.
  • Fixed the z-index to top navigation dropdown level.
  • Added options to "Tabs" widget for customization.
  • Added option to Avenue theme options panel to disabled featured slider.
  • Added option to disable featured image per single posts page.
  • Added twitter and facebook fields to "Edit profile page". Author website will now link in author bio along with a link to their twitter and facebook account (twitter and facebook is optional).
  • Added cache to twitter widget.
  • Added target to button shortcode.
  • Added languages folder in the theme folder. Drop your translation files in the theme folder.
  • Added description to category and tag pages.
  • Fixed contact form subject line.
  • Added latest reviews widget.
  • Updated documentation.
